DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study Clinical Utility Acupuncture Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Epidemiological , observational , prospective , two cohort , naturalistic non-interventionist study . The disease study Back pain ( cervical , thoracic lumbar ) cause musculoskeletal pathology previously treat conventional medical treatment without treatment currently .
